patterns: How long does delivery take?
How long does shipping take?
When do I get my delivery?
responses: Delivery takes 2-4 days. Would you like to place an order?
We offer express delivery in 1-2 days at an additional cost. Would you like to place an order?
Standard delivery usually takes 3-5 business days. Would you like to place an order?

patterns: How can I place an order?
What steps do I need to follow to order?
Can I place an order now?
Where can I find the order form?
What payment methods are accepted?
responses: To place an order, you can visit our website or contact us directly. Once you've chosen your items, proceed to checkout to complete your order.
You can place an order by selecting your desired items and following the steps for payment. If you have any questions, feel free to ask!
Yes, you can place an order now. Please provide your details and choose your products, and we’ll take care of the rest!
You can find the order form on our website’s ‘Shop’ section. Fill it out, review your selection, and proceed to checkout.
We accept various payment methods including credit/debit cards, net banking, and UPI payments.

patterns: Do you take credit cards?
Do you accept debit cards?

responses: We accept credit cards, debit cards, UPI, and cash.
We accept major payment methods including credit cards, debit cards, UPI, and cash.

patterns: Tell me a joke!

responses: Why did the hipster burn his mouth? He drank the coffee before it was cool.
What did the buffalo say when his son left for college? Bison.
